body.p: You can edit DataStage test cases either from the Asset browser or directly from within the DataStage designer canvas.

ol.li: Under Asset types tab select DataStage components > Test cases.
Click the name of the test case you wish to edit.
Click the Test cases icon to open up the test cases side panel.
Click the name of the test case you wish to edit.

body.p: This will bring you to the test case editor which suports the following functions:

li.xref: Inspecting your test case JSON specification
